title: Call for coal phaseout meets some objections at climate summit | TheHill
content:
1. Call for coal phaseout meets some objections at climate summit | TheHill  The Hill
  2. Nations reach climate change agreement in Glasgow but follow-through in doubt  Yahoo News
  3. Nations reach climate deal with unprecedented reference to fossil fuels, but doesn't reflect urgency of crisis  CNN
  4. It could have been worse, but our leaders failed us at Cop26. That’s the truth of it.  The Guardian
  5. Cop26 has been a failure and our lacklustre world leaders are to blame  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
